name: HogwartsHouse
0:
”Alexa, open Hogwarts House”
”Alexa, launch Hogwarts House”
”Alexa, ask Hogwarts House what house would I be in”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hogwarts house
des:
Ever wondered what house the Sorting Hat would put you in at Hogwarts? Would you be in Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw or perhaps Hufflepuff?
Just ask Hogwarts House and find out.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
